game.name: Horizons Light
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A luxury deep-space vacation cruiser is mysteriously drawn off course and crash-lands on an uncharted multi-world orbiting within a strange gravitational anomaly. The vessel is shattered across floating islands suspended above a glowing abyss. Find the survivors and get out of this world.
